mapper.insert: insert into cart(id, product_id, product_amount) values(#{id}, #{product_id}, #{product_amount})
update cart set product_amount = #{product_amount} where 1 = 1 and id = #{id} and product_id = #{product_id};
mapper.delete: delete from cart where 1=1 and product_id = #{product_id} and id = #{id};
